translations: adj.非绅士的；无绅士风度的；无教养的

phrs.translation: 非绅士的, 缺乏教养的, 不象绅士的

sentences.sentence: In fact, it is thought to be ungentlemanly.
sentences.translation: 事实上，那是会被认为没有绅士风度的。

sentences.sentence: I am surprised at your ungentlemanly behaviour.
sentences.translation: 你这种不绅士的行为，让我大为惊讶。

sentences.sentence: "Some people feel that it is" ungentlemanly "to constantly defeat your opponents-unless the game is soccer."
sentences.translation: 有些英国人认为，老是打败对手没有“绅士风度”，当然足球比赛除外！
